name: Feudalism
summary:
Feudalism is an strategy/RPG with open world, so you can go wherever you want and fight anyone.

You start with only one city where you can recruit soldiers, but the bigger city you capture, the better troops you gain.

name: Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark - Missions and Monsters
summary: Missions and Monsters is the first expansion to Fell Seal: Arbiter‚Äôs Mark and brings several new additions to enrich the gameplay.

name: Feed the Horsebear
summary: Two snowmen jump with a potato plate from a platform to another. The snowmen have to take potatoes to horsebear.

name: Felix the Reaper
summary:
Felix The Reaper - A romantic comedy game about the life of death.

Felix The Reaper is a romantic comedy about the life of Death. It's brought to you on PC as a 3D shadow manipulation puzzle adventure game of dance, dying people and dangerous love.

Felix has set out to conquer the heart of Betty The Maiden. He's fallen in love watching her from the train window commuting to work everyday for ages. He works at The Ministry of Death, she works at The Ministry of Life. Hence they don't meet.

He's taught himself to dance, because he's convinced, that will win Betty over. And he's gotten really good at it too.

Finally Felix has come to realise, that it's not enough, that he can dance, if they never meet. And one day he decides to become a Field Reaper and go to work in the human world. That's where life and death collides. Hence he might finally get to ask Betty out for a dance.

Excel at making sure people die, the way they are destined to, because that's what Field Reapers do, and Felix might finally get to meet Betty here in the human world.

Felix The Reaper is produced by Kong Orange with support from The Danish Film Institute and The West Danish Film Fund, and the production has been invested in by CapNova.

name: Ferrari Grand Prix Challenge
summary:
The Nintendo Entertainment System version of the game is a simplified version that allows players to practice up to six laps or qualify for every Formula One race of the season using metric units (kilometres per hour instead of miles per hour). It was one of the few 8-bit Formula One video games to adequately represent the Circuit Gilles Villeneuve as having an urban background along with several other urban race tracks represented in the 1992 Formula One season. Tire wear is possible resulting in trips to the pit crew for maintenance and repairs. A radio allows communication with the crew chief; he will advise whether repairs are necessary. The top speed of the vehicle is 325 kilometres per hour and turbo is not used in the game.
Before the first qualifying session can take place, the player must insert his name and his nationality. The name can be up to 10 characters long and the country has to fit into a three-character field. Since the game doesn't verify if the three-letter code matches up to a real nationality, it doesn't matter if the player makes up a nationality for a fictional country.

name: Fengse Huanxiang 5: Chi Yue Zhanzheng
summary:
**This game is playable in Chinese only**

Long time ago, the humans have discovered the secrets of nature. They have built a powerful civilization with advanced technology. But this led to the destruction of nature and death of living beings. God became angry and punished the humans with countless disasters. Seven leaders of the humans sacrificed their lives in order to put an end to their civilization, seal its secrets, and bring peace onto the world.

But 900 years have passed, and the humans began to re-discover the ancient civilization. Once again, their greed led to wars. each country employed treasure hunters, who were trained to visit dangerous places and to bring them relics from the advanced civilization of the past. You control a group of such hunters under the command of a brave young man names Aiyin. What starts as a simple mission to protect the newly acquired treasure from pirate attacks end in a struggle to save humanity from committing the same error once again...

name: Fear and Loathing
summary:
Welcome to Mars, Marine. Due to a plague of photosensitivity caused by cheap gas station cheese and retinal parasites, we've had to enforce a strict low-light policy for the sake of our staff. That won't be a problem, right? You shouldn't expect to see much action up here anyway...

Fear and Loathing is a limit-removing Doom 2 mapset from various members of Doomer Boards. Conductor Scrangus McBrickdad (aka @Jaxxoon R), the lead behind the tranquil Lillywhite Lilith, brings the exact opposite with a spooky combination of ambient sounds, darkness*, vicious monsters and perhaps most horrifying of all: Doom 3. There's also some extra eye candy for GZDoom users, which is perfect for the Halloween season.

name: Fenced In
summary: An arcade-puzzle game inspired by Zoo Keeper, Fenced in has you managing 10 different animals into 4 pens, making sure carnivores don't eat herbivores and filling up the pens as much as possible to get the highest score possible!

name: Fernbus Simulator: Bavarian Castle
summary: This free DLC will add the famous and romantic 19th-century bavarian castle to the world of Fernbus Simulator.

name: Fear in Hospital
summary: Fear in Hospital is a terrible survivor horror in hospital where you should find a occult path to exit!

name: Few Shall Return
summary: Few Shall Return is a PvPvE multiplayer dungeon extraction adventure. You have together to survive, but you're on your own at the end of the day. Each round only takes 7.5 minutes

name: Feed Us: Pirates
summary: Argh!! The Pirates have invaded the shores! Our little piranha friend is back again, in a buccaneer adventure! This expansion to Feed Us Lost Island has new victims to eat, new customizations and new objectives to complete.

name: Feria d'Arles
summary: Molly dreams of being the bravest matador in France. Explore the city of Arles and enter the world-famous tournament. Uncover corruption, conspiracy, and a load of bull.

name: F.E.A.R.: Platinum Collection
summary:
F.E.A.R. Platinum includes the original F.E.A.R. and its two addons: F.E.A.R. Extraction Point and F.E.A.R. Perseus Mandate.

Be the hero in your own cinematic epic of action, tension and terror. A mysterious paramilitary force infiltrates a multi-billion dollar aerospace compound, taking hostages but issuing no demands. The government responds by sending in a Special Forces team only to have them obliterated. Live footage of the massacre shows an inexplicable wave of destruction tearing the soldiers apart. With no other recourse, the elite F.E.A.R. (First Encounter Assault Recon) team is assembled to deal with the extraordinary circumstances. They are given one simple mission: Evaluate the threat and eliminate the intruders at any cost.

F.E.A.R. Extraction Point
Extraction Point kicks off where the original game ended ‚Äì with a bang. As the helicopter which the F.E.A.R. team is on attempts to leave the vicinity, it instead winds up crashing. The F.E.A.R. team is thus forced to seek out an alternate extraction point, all the way battling the now free Alma and her paranormal minions across a destroyed city.

F.E.A.R. Perseus Mandate
As the first F.E.A.R. team and Delta Force fight for control of the situation, a second F.E.A.R. team is sent in to shed some light on Armacham Technology Corporation's (ATC) dark past. As a member of a secondary F.E.A.R. team, you are brought in to discover more information regarding the secret project at the ATC facilities.
Hyper-stylized combat for breathtaking cinematic quality action
Gripping supernatural storyline for spine-tingling intensity of play
Advanced graphics and physics for visceral movie-like experience
Enemies with special abilities and A.I. so intuitive it‚Äôs like battling living, breathing players

name: Felvidek
summary: Find out what unlikely events take place in this alternate history region of Slovak Highlands. This land is ravaged by Hussite pillagers and Ottoman spies while surreal horrors dwell in the dark. It's now up to Pavol, a fair knight with alcohol problems, to gather a party and stop those who oppose our kingdom.

name: Feudal Craft
summary: Immerse yourself in an exciting medieval settlement simulator where you will have to fight for your place in the feudal hierarchy. Use a smart strategy to develop your settlement. After all, it is the skills and equipment of each peasant that can make the difference.

name: Fear Academy
summary: Fear Academy is a psychological horror where you play as the principal of Hillcrest High. Returning to retrieve a forgotten item, you become trapped in a nightmare as an ancient evil takes over the school. Explore, solve puzzles, and survive the lurking horrors to uncover the terrifying truth.

name: Femme Fatale
summary:
Taisho era.
Main character is a detective in Tokyo.
He returns to hometown to dispose of his father's legacy.
Local policeman tells him about a case of girl death from illness at a boarding school, but under suspicious conditions.
Detective decides to investigate the incident as he needs to stay at the town for some time anyway.

name: Feed My Mech
summary: Your mech is all that stands between you and what writhes below. FEED MY MECH is a short horror experience‚Äîventure into a dead underground colony and recover lost tech. But something is spreading through the machines‚Ä¶ and it‚Äôs looking for a way inside your mech.

name: Feline
summary: Feline is a GameBoy Advance game which is made using Butano. This game was made for GBA Jam 2021 of itch.io.

name: Fear & Hunger
summary: A dark fantasy survival horror RPG in which players must uncover the secrets of the dungeon of Fear & Hunger.

name: Fervent
summary:
A short, VHS - style horror game where you step into the shoes of a paranormal investigator. As you venture into the eerie Fervent Campsite, you'll uncover mysterious obelisks with cryptic symbols, abandoned white tents, and an unsettling ritual book.

Average playtime is 10 minutes.

name: Feastopia
summary: Feastopia is a roguelike simulation game. In this rich yet mysterious land, you sign a contract with an egg that fell from the sky and undertake the grand task of establishing a prosperous food capital.

name: Fechtbucher
summary: Fechtbucher - Uber-Realistic Medieval game, with Melee Combat based on Physics. Participate in tournaments, or explore the dungeons to uncover a dark story. Master guards and strikes inspired by HEMA, straight out of medieval guidebooks.

name: Felt Mansion
summary: Felt Mansion is a 2D-fangame based on the Homestuck universe, developed between November 2016 and August 2019 on RPG-Maker VX Ace. Felt Mansion is an Adventure RPG mainly focused on boss fights and exploration

name: Fearbonding
summary: Fearbonding is a Yandere x Demon BL Horror Visual Novel. Play as Hinata, a demon, and try to tame the deranged Kosuke. Will you get to satisfy your hunger for fear through your new hunting dog or will you be the one to get devoured?

name: Fearless Fantasy
summary: As Leon, the world‚Äôs most dangerous bounty hunter, you embark on a mission to slay the world‚Äôs weirdest creatures, and save a girl from an awful marriage.

name: Fears to Fathom: Norwood Hitchhike
summary: Holly Gardner, a 19 year old on an interstate drive experiences unusual happenings that leads to an unplanned stay at a motel, little did she know what was transpiring down in Norwood Valley.

name: Fear for Sale: City of the Past HD - A Hidden Object Mystery
Fernz Gate
summary: Travel to the other side and beyond and find a way back home in a fantasy RPG!

name: Feed All Monsters
summary: Feed All Monsters is a cute and cozy Line Puzzle game. Assist a team of delivery workers in their quest to bring tasty food to all the little monsters. Find the optimal path for each worker in order to get all the monsters fed.

name: Fearmonium
summary: Fearmonium is a psychedelic action-platformer where suspense intertwines with humor. Start the game as the usual unpleasant memory and, reincarnate into a real phobia by breaking through the most hidden corners of consciousness of Jimmy.

name: Fear of Energy
summary: As a detective following a missing person case, you encounter a mysterious creature. With limited ammo and nowhere to run, can you survive and uncover the truth? A tense and terrifying survival horror experience awaits you.

name: Female Swordsman
summary: This is a casual puzzle game, where the position of each game image is random and can be repeated.At first, it may be very chaotic,Then gradually place the image in the corresponding position,The image gradually becomes complete,Come and give it a try!

name: Feed the Lie
summary: NEWS CENSOR: edit headlines, replace words, and approve only the ‚Äúsafe‚Äù stories. But remember: one wrong word can end your career.

name: Fetish Fetish Collection! DX
summary: An exploration RPG consisting of fetish fetish collection! series + newly drawn characters + Œ±!

name: Feud
summary: Feud is a turn-based strategy game. Swap pieces on a four-by-four grid to isolate your opponent's pieces, or go straight for their King. Hone your skills against three AI characters with distinct play-styles, then challenge your friends online or on the same screen.

name: Fear The Reaper
summary: Fear The Reaper is a PVP multiplayer horror game in which players take on unique roles and live out the experience of starring in a slasher film.

name: Femdom Lines
summary: Improve your typing skills in the most depraved way.

name: Feral Fury
summary: Fast-paced twin stick shooter rogue-lite action

name: Feed the Maw
summary: The Maw is hungry, and you are the island's chosen hero. Explore the deadly, mysterious island with your fellow islanders and loot for offerings to feed the beast before he gets angry!

name: Feather Land
summary: Feather Land is an idle game that blends productivity tools with a study/work companion. Enjoy calming music, hatch eggs, collect cute birds, and watch a quiet space into a landscape full of life, bringing peace and focus to your study or work sessions.

name: Ferb
summary: Descend into darkness in FERB, a horror adventure where you explore a foreboding cave, uncover secrets, and face a half-robotic beast that thrives on fear. Solve puzzles, survive five intense chapters, and outsmart FERB in solo or co-op play. Will you uncover the truth‚Äîor be hunted?

name: Fear of The Undead: Rise of Evil
summary: Fear of The Undead: Rise of Evil features a PvE battle with wave progression, the further the player goes, the harder it gets. It offers four characters with distinct stories and abilities, along with a catalog of maps and weapons.

name: Feed the Pets: Fall Animals
summary: Feed the Pets: Fall Animals is a cute clicker where you shall feed the pets, and make them happy!

name: F.E.A.R.: Complete Pack
summary:
This bundle includes the following:

- F.E.A.R.
- F.E.A.R.: Extraction Point
- F.E.A.R.: Perseus Mandate
- F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin
- F.E.A.R. 2: Reborn (DLC)
- F.E.A.R. 3

name: Feral Blue
summary: Feral Blue is about surviving on a ship with your crew in the boundless Ocean, which once flooded the entire planet. Start with your first ship, build your town, subdue your enemies and create your own oceanic empire!

name: F.E.A.R 3: Collector's Edition
summary: Alma returns in F.E.A.R. 3 but this time her sons Point Man and Paxton Fettel introduce divergent co-op, giving players distinctly different abilities affecting their own play as well as the experience of their co-op partner. Gamers participate in single player or co-op modes as Point Man, a genetically enhanced super soldier originally introduced in F.E.A.R., or they can play cooperatively as his conniving brother Paxton Fettel, whose incredible telekinetic power has given him life beyond the grave. The game is developed by Day 1 Studios, developer of the original F.E.A.R. console games in collaboration with Monolith Studios.

name: Feed Mii
summary: Feed Mii is a cookery simulation game developed by Prope. It is based in the same world as StreetPass Quest/Find Mii although has no effect on gameplay in the game. The concept involves cooking required dishes with 10 ingredients (which can be purchased with play coins or supplied by StreetPassed Miis). Selecting the right ingredients leads to higher points and so the Miis make more progress in the quest adventure.

name: Femida
summary: Judge Simulator 2020. Play the role of Judge Daemon Mardoch and investigate the disappearance of your father during the Last Revolution. Set in the dystopian State with a post-WWII level of tech and noir aesthetics.

name: Feeet
summary: Feeet is a radical, indie take on the beloved pipe-puzzle and virtual novel genres.

name: Feed Us 2
summary: The deadly piranha is back and hungrier than ever! This time around you must complete objectives such as eating certain targets or more challenging combinations. Complete all objectives to get to the top of the food chain.

name: Feudal Baron: King's Land
summary: The King has granted you the right to rule over a part of his kingdom. Feudal Baron: King's Land is a strategy game in which you build, develop and govern a medieval city, take care of its citizens and defend it against the enemies of the realm.

name: Feitu Xiaohongmao
summary:
"Feitu Tonghua" First Chapter.

Stories that take place in a wasteland world following a nuclear war.

name: FelisBelus
summary: A funny game to represent our pet cats and keep a record and memory of them forever.

name: Fever Sankyo Koushiki Pachinko Simulation for WonderSwan
summary:
The Sankyo Fever series' sole WonderSwan entry.

Fever Sankyo Koushiki Pachinko Simulation for WonderSwan is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Bec, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Feudal Bros: Tonosama #1
summary: Japan. Edo period. After many years of violent wars, peace has returned to the land, but it doesn‚Äôt seem like it will last for long. A new danger lurks in the shadows, and only two noblemen can stop it: Lord Baka, a Japanese feudal lord, and Prince Bouffon, a prince from the faraway land of France.

name: Fear the Unknown: Jamie Story
summary: This story is one of the rare accounts we've managed to document a tale from the few who have encountered UFOs and lived to tell the tale. Jamie's story has reached us and now, it's time to uncover what really happened.

name: Feudal Alloy
summary:
It's a metroidvania-style action RPG with fishbowl-powered medieval robots!
Explore a huge medieval world, improve your combat skills by smashing a lot of mechanic creatures and talk to other robots using unique animated dialogues.

name: Feed Us V
summary: Another killer species is free from captivity and out for blood! Our favourite Piranha has escaped the local Aquarium and is terrorizing various surroundings, but this time he has found grim allies. The objective is to eat as much as you can, complete objectives, upgrade your fish and call on your allies when you need them.

name: Felony 11-79
summary:
Hit and run, baby!

Thrash beach-front property, police cars, glass fronted mini-malls and billboards -- essentially, any and everything goes for the greatest joyride of your life! The mission is grab the goods, destroy what you can and get the heck outta town...fast!

name: Festered
summary: Brave the terrors of a contaminated research facility, where every step could be your last. PSX style survival horror game.

name: Felicity's Door
summary: As Tom and Felicity fall asleep and slip into dreamland, they find themselves in a strange, unfamiliar bedroom filled to the brim with toys and gadgets‚Ä¶ Join them and Mi-chan on adventures where you will have to show off your musical prowess to help souls in need!

name: Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark
summary:
Fell Seal: Arbiter's Mark is a story-driven, turn-based tactical RPG set in a fantasy world with a touch of steampunk. Take control of the Arbiter Kyrie, an agent of the Immortal Council tasked with preserving stability and order throughout the land, and lead your troops through difficult encounters.

Experience an epic and mature story, unfolding through over 40 story encounters and topped with challenging end-game content.

Classic tactical combat battles, with rugged terrain and elevation, taking place on beautiful hand-drawn environments.

A deep and complex class system with over 30 classes and 300 abilities lets you truly customize every one of your characters through the selection of their class, sub-class and passives. Carefully craft the character you envision, be it a versatile generalist, a dedicated spell-caster or a mighty foe-crushing specialist!

Customize your troops' appearance your way, by selecting their portrait, outfit, colors and overall visuals from a wide selection.

Equip your army with over 240 pieces of equipment, either purchased, gathered from fallen enemies or created from crafting.

name: Feed Your Cat.
summary: You wake up in the middle of the night as your cat is in desperate need of food.

name: Fear the Wolves
summary:
Fear the Wolves drops players, in squads or as lone wolves, into the oppressive environments of a radiation-ravaged Chernobyl. The classic Battle Royale mode forces them to fight to be the last man standing out of 100 fighters. Another intense and original game mode will also bring a fierce new twist to the genre.

To secure the top spot, players will need to worry about more than just other survivors. Across the hostile wastes, everyone is threatened by deadly anomalies and the dynamically-changing weather. Along with a day-night cycle, this constantly forces survivors to adapt their strategies, and players can find protective gear that allows them to explore dangerous off-limit zones. All the while, the howls of mutated creatures echo through the wasteland‚Ä¶

name: Femboy Feet
summary: Feet and Femboys? What more could a man ask for. Pursue your femboy fantasy solving unique puzzles to unlock the ultimate femboy.

name: FeedVid
summary:
Introducing FeedVid, a revolutionary new video-sharing website and social network. Our platform integrates an advanced neural-network based algorithm that automatically determines your viewing preferences. We serve you the content that you want to watch!

Update from FeedVid Inc. CEO August Williams

We are aware of an issue affecting a small number of users in which our algorithm will recommend disturbing or highly unusual videos. We appreciate the support from the community and ask that you flag any such videos that you find in your feed.

name: Feline Realms: The Ancients' Legacy
summary: Feline Realms: The Ancients' Legacy is a quirky turn-based RPG where ancient feline heroes rediscover their forgotten heritage to defend Earth from an invading force. Unlock your Guardian powers, and navigate a modern world filled with danger. Can you reclaim your legacy and save Earth?

name: Festival Tycoon
summary:
Create and manage your own music festival empire. Book bands, setup stages, organise your line-up, layout tents and portaloos, roll out the food trucks and build your festival‚Äôs reputation to appease sponsors and earn big bucks.

In Festival Tycoon, booking bands, setting up stages, organizing the line-ups, layout tents and portaloos is some of the many mechanics one will need to master to build the festival of their dreams.

Players will be able to create, design, and manage their own music festival empire, starting from humble beginnings in tiny fields to a Coachella-sized event.

A fusion of builder, management and RTS, Festival Tycoon is all about hosting the wildest festival the world has ever seen in adorable, colourful voxels.

Features:
üé™ Design the optimal festival layout: Place tents, VIP bungalows, glamorous stages, portaloos, festival decorations and more!
üé∏Book talent and arrange a stellar line-up: Put your bargaining skills and musical taste to the test by hiring a range of bands across the likes of folk, rock and techno.
üé´ Attract sponsors and sell tickets: Appease sponsors like banks, record labels and drink companies for grants.
ü§© Keep the crowds happy: Be wary of your attendees' satisfaction, as unhappy punters are quick to take to social media and ruin your reputation!

name: Fear FA 98
summary: FEAR FA 98: Silent Hill mixed with FIFA 98. Use your enemies' heads as the ball, use knives, and summon demons! the very first survival horror soccer simulator!. Play against the computer, or the classic local mode to enjoy with your friends on a terrifying afternoon worthy of the '90s.

name: Fear the Spotlight
summary: Fear the Spotlight is an atmospheric third-person horror adventure with a disturbing mystery to unravel. Sneak into school after hours with Vivian and Amy, survive a s√©ance gone wrong, solve tactile puzzles, and, whatever you do, stay out of the spotlight‚Ä¶

name: Fe
summary:
Fe is a new type of platform adventure where the story is up to you to discover, without handholding, told wordlessly through the discoveries you make during gameplay.

Run, climb, and glide your way through a dark Nordic forest and explore its living, breathing ecosystem filled with secrets and mystical creatures.

At the heart of the experience is a tactile, analogue song mechanic that allows you to communicate and speak to every living thing in the forest.

Learn a diverse array of animal cries that allow you to befriend or manipulate any creature - even plants. Have birds guide you, bears fight for you and have plants grow berries that help you overcome the Silent Ones.

Become Fe and discover a world that you will never want to leave.

name: Felix the Cat
summary: Felix the Cat is an unlicensed Russian Genesis port of the NES game of the same name. The game is notable for it's graphic game over screen, which shows Felix ripping his face off.

name: FeedBack
summary: This game offers a classic pixel art style, taking players on a nostalgic and charming adventure.

name: Feral Sense
summary: FERAL SENSE is a 3D platform adventure. Play as a cat escaping a city ruled by machines. Use your Feral Sense to uncover hidden secrets and navigate dangers as you seek the last sanctuary of nature. Can you survive and find freedom?

name: Fearless Rider
summary: Fearless Rider is an exciting driving game where the player must avoid hitting or getting crushed by obstacles.

name: Feist
summary:
Feist is a beautiful, poetic and action packed game, with an enchanting and spooky atmosphere. It tells the story of a small creature surviving in a mysterious, hostile world. Once players escape the crude crate the strange, lumbering beasts used for a trap, players journey through sprawling forests, mountains, caves, and swamps, brought to life in a cinematic physical-effects style reminiscent of Jim Henson‚Äôs The Dark Crystal, or Hedgehog in the Fog.

The dreamlike world of Feist is a striking and mesmerizing place, but dangerous AI-controlled enemies keep pushing the players toward their fate. Enemies and traps, without scripted sequences, interact and produce surprising emergent consequences, creating a physics-driven environment with its own rules. The gorgeous, lush backgrounds are brought to life by a haunting and restrained soundtrack.

name: Fevirre's CT Pack
summary: Fevirre's CT Pack is a custom track distribution for Mario Kart 8: Deluxe that adds in various retro tracks into the game.

name: Fear Effect Sedna
summary: "Fear Effect Sedna is a pausable real-time tactical action game. Become reacquainted with the old team of Hana, Rain, Deke & Glas in a brand new adventure. From Hong Kong to Greenland, through Inuit mythology and with new partners, will you dare to face the spirit world once again?"

name: Fear of the Light
summary: A survival horror game where light is scarier than darkness. Use your radar and other tools to stay out of the light, sneak around dangers, explore the quarantined ship, and find a way to escape. But be careful, monsters are hunting you and are aware of your every mistake!

name: Fear the Flossom
summary:
1st Person Shooter Horror Survival 
 
Racing against the clock, can you last 3 minutes against the zombie horde.

name: Fell from another world
summary: Fell from another world is a visual novel with RPG elements, team recruitement, minigames and exploration. Travel from earth to this strange new world along with Eurys and reveal the secrets behind the head of the kingdom.

name: Fear the Phantom
summary: Co-op paranormal investigation with PvP for 1-4 players. Intense horror game with a dark atmosphere.

name: Feed your cat
summary: You wake up in the middle of the night as your cat is in desperate need of food. The game has six endings in total.

name: Fester Mudd: Curse of the Gold - Episode 1
summary: Fester Mudd: Curse of the Gold - Episode 1 is a tribute to the golden era of adventure gaming. It is a point-and-click styled humoristic adventure game with old school graphics and style similar to Monkey Island 1 & 2 etc.

name: Feeding the Velociraptors
summary: Feeding the Velociraptors is a point-and-click interactive escape game where you wander corridors, trying to escape both the blame for your past actions‚Äîand the scientifically realistic raptors who cast no blame upon you for said past actions, but will still eat you regardless.

name: Festiba+
summary:
Get crazy in 5 minutes! "Great Battle Party Royale" that you can enjoy with easy controls!
‚ÄúFight,‚Äù ‚Äúdance,‚Äù ‚Äúchange your clothes,‚Äù and ‚Äústream‚Äù to get noticed in your own unique way!
This is the place where everyone can shine!

An entertainment show in which heroes from different worlds gather on a giant flying stage called a flying arena and engage in heated battles. That is ‚ÄúFesba Plus‚Äù!
The heroes are transported from another world as duplicates using super technology (Realizer) and are holding a battle show in a flying arena.
Players can control each hero and anyone can enjoy "Fesba Plus"!

name: Feed Us 3
summary: Yes, the piranha is back with a bigger appetite. This action trilogy offers new challenging objectives, with several new obstacles. You now have to watch out for sea monsters, the great white shark and electrifying jelly fish! As an achievement you can also collect treasur chests, that will give extra time to attain your objectives. Plunge into this funny and addicting game and enjoy the bloody action.

name: Fears to Fathom: Home Alone
summary: In the first episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Miles, a 14 years old kid who is home alone while his parents are out of town for work. He soon finds himself in trouble as the story unfolds, would he make it through the night?

name: Felis: Cat Saving Platformer
summary:
Felis is a Cat-Saving platformer.
If you love cats, and enjoy the classic platformer genre, then this is the perfect combination for you.Goal:You are the cats' only salvation. Free them from their traps and have them follow you, and take them to safety. Not every cat will be easy to find. Make sure the whole team gets alive to the end. Amidst evil creatures determined to steal your beloved cats and keep you from saving your feline buddies.Features:Puzzle Elements
Magical Powers
Pickable Cat Friends
Rideable Griffin
...And Much More!

name: Feed Us: Lost Island
summary: Hey! Our little piranha friend is back again, with a furious hunger ... this time in an exotic location. The game introduces several new features, including customization of your fish, improved quality of graphics and game play and tons of new targets to eat and enemies to avoid!. We also brought back the challenging objectives to complete in six compelling worlds.

name: Fear Tapes: Scrap Yard
summary:
Out in the backwoods, you discover someone has left a small, neatly packed case of VHS tapes at your cabin doorstep. It is labeled, "Promotional Materials."

Why not put a tape in the VHS player?

name: Femboy Fury
summary: Femboy Fury is a demolition derby of high-octane proportions! Choose between 10 femboy characters and compete in an arcade like drive-and-shoot in semi-destructible environments! Franticly search for weapon pick-ups as you dodge enemies chasing you! Be the last femboy driving in 8 levels!

name: F.E.A.R. Combat
summary: F.E.A.R. Combat is a standalone multiplayer component based on F.E.A.R. but released for free less than a year after the original game. F.E.A.R. already had full multiplayer options, but this component allows everyone to join the online battles, without needing to buy the game. It includes 22 multiplayer maps, 10 game modes, all the weapons and updates, and the ability to play user-generated content. You only need to apply for a free CD key. Users of this version can also play against the owners of the original game.

name: Festival Journey: Venetian Masquerade - Collector's Edition
summary: Explore Venice through puzzles and hidden objects in this festive journey ‚Äî light on story, rich in fun!

name: Federation Mycha
summary: Step into a world over run with Mycha, a strange mineral with seemingly magical powers. Clear monster-infested environments and protect researchers on your own or with up to three other players online. Welcome to The Federation.

name: Feverdream: Rainbow Chaser
summary: Free your mind with Feverdream: Rainbow Chaser, a free cross-platform multiplayer shooter. Team up with friends to create and surf rainbows in any direction, as you track and eliminate assigned player targets in a surreal desert environment.

name: Feasts Seasons
summary:
Feasts Seasons is a game where you travel through a world colored by the seasons of the year with vehicle skins.

Go as far as you can to finish at the top of the leaderboard, and receive rewards at the end of the season!
Updates include new cosmetics and gameplay additions.

name: Feast: Book One - Family Ties
summary: Feast is an experimental visual novel with our own unique design. Travel through the original fantasy world and learn its secrets together with the characters.

name: Fear Below Zero
summary: Survive an isolated Antarctic research station as you hide from an ancient creature, scavenge for parts, and repair communications to call for rescue.

name: Fech the Ferret
summary: Fech The Ferret is a fast and loud parkour game about a (cute) pink ferret. Go run around, sometimes to the beat of electronic music. Make your own path and explore with Fech the region of Marmocle as you meet other friendly animals in this vast world.

name: Federation 2: Community Edition
summary: Federation 2, the space trading game, is a massively multi-player game set within an exciting world of interstellar commerce and intrigue, in which you interact and collaborate with lots of other players in real-time, and compete against them to climb the ranks. The aim of the game is to amass a larger fortune (in Imperial Groats) than any other player, and to climb the ranks by forging alliances and making friends with the right people. Cooperation is the name of the game in Federation.

name: Felbound
summary: Felbound is a challenging and ruthless roguelike game. Embark on a journey into a mysterious dungeon, facing off against orcs and goblins with a plethora of weapons spells and items!

name: Federation77
summary: Federation77 - a dynamic VR arena shooter filled with violence, brutality and stimulants. Shoot, chop and dismember a marginalized society in VR. Post-Soviet cyberpunk and reactive rhythmic gameplay.

name: Femboy Futa House
summary: Congratulations, you've been accepted to the College of Magical Arts! Immerse yourself in a rich student life full of magic, passion, and adventure. Meet the eccentric residents of dorm 9 ¬æ and get to know them as closely as you can...

name: Femboy Futa House: Kinky Field Trip
summary: They say there‚Äôs no place like home‚Ä¶ but sometimes, you have to leave your dorm and take on an adventure. Pack your things and join the class trip to the one and only town of Kinksmouth. Forbidden secrets, lustful cultists, and ancient, indecent gods await you in the crooked streets of this little town.

name: Feeding Frenzy
summary: Slurp, gulp, and crunch your way all along the Frenzy Coast in Feeding Frenzy! The rules here are simple: Eat anything that's smaller than you and swim clear of everything else. The more you eat, the bigger you get, and the bigger you get, the closer you come to taking on the fearsome Shark King. Starfish bubbles don't help you grow, but they‚Äôre an easy way to boost your score. Oysters offer up bonus points in the form of pearls, but be quick or the shell could snap shut with you inside! Nibbling on the tail of a patrolling barracuda is a risky way to earn extra points‚Äîhe can turn on you in an instant. And the jellyfish - well, it's best to swim clear of them altogether. Did you know that tuna can swim up to 50 miles per hour? Or that a parrot fish can change its gender? Feeding Frenzy includes more than four dozen fascinating fish facts like these - one between each game level.

name: Fears to Fathom: Scratch Creek
summary: After noticing bone-chilling similarities to an episode of Fears to Fathom, Tessa and Marcus decide to share their own experience.

name: Fear of the Dark
summary: Fear Of The Dark is a retro 16-BIT tribute to classic survival horror games from the late 90s.

name: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin - Limited Edition
summary: It includes both the original F.E.A.R. and F.E.A.R. 2 Project Origin, as well as exclusive in-game skins and steelbox presentation

name: Feast or Fracture
summary: Build, recruit, or buy your way to prosperity in this 2.5-D strategy game. Choose your path through a variety of multi-choice events. Balance the allegiance of your faction leaders against the path you know you should take. Guide your units and villages across a beautiful, hex-based map.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Top Class DD
summary: This DLC includes the Top Class DD. A luxury double-decker bus for Fernbus Coach Simulator

name: Femboy Called It ‚ÄúMassage‚Äù
summary: Run a ‚Äúspecial‚Äù massage parlor for charming femboys . Flirt, master the art of touch in an interactive mini-game, earn cash, unlock spicy scenes, and uncover your grandpa‚Äôs naughty secret in this 2D adult visual novel.

name: Feed The Scorchpot
summary: A cozy-chaotic tabletop roguelike about dice, meals, and mild panic. Build your board, harvest what you can, and serve up dishes fast enough to stop your dragon from burning the whole economy down.

name: Fecal Freighter
summary: Become a sewage truck operator and survive the foul dangers: drive your ZIL, battle sludge demons, complete tasks, explore a grim world, and uncover the mystery of an alien conspiracy.

name: Fear Protocol: Codename Omega Starring Agent Jack Banger
summary: It's a nice dark day in Escondido, California and special agent Jack Banger and his superior Gilbert Simpson are planning their next operation. Their life of luxury is soon interrupted however when strange biomonster creatures start appearing all over the city...

name: Feed the Ducks
summary: Feed the Ducks is a short casual platformer game with pixel graphics.

name: Feed the Deep
summary: A lovecraftian roguelite. Dive into procedurally generated undersea caves. Collect gold, upgrade your equipment, and Feed the Deep.

name: Felix the Cat
summary: Join Felix on his worldwide search as flies a monoplane across mountains, delves into the ocean depths in a submarine and races across bizarre landscapes in a wild and whacky one-wheeled car! All provided by the Magic Bag of Tricks!

name: Feral Echoes
summary: Feral Echoes is an exciting survival adventure where every step counts. The game combines elements of survival, exploration, magic, and combat. Explore wild lands, build shelters, fight monsters, solve puzzles, and create your unique story.

name: Feed Me Billy
summary: A flesh-eating hole has appeared in your closet. It's YOUR job to feed it. You must! No matter what the cost... Terrorize the town on your sick quest for meat in this deranged serial killer simulator.

name: Fear the Dark Unknown: Chloe
summary: The clock is ticking and the survival game can no longer be stopped. James and Chloe have been chosen and nothing will ever be the same again after discovering the Dark Unknown.

name: Feral Blood Doll
summary: Psychedelic gutter sludge CRPG for hot people. Nonlinear, interaction-rich psycho bad girl roleplay in a decaying postmodern megastructure. Fast-paced turn-based combat lets you eat cops, puke on feds, summon your gfs in battle and more. Go to raves. Get pierced. Drink blood. Escape the city.

name: Femdom Stories: Findom Simulator Sex Game
Fetish Locator Week Three
summary: The last chapter of Fetish Locator is finally here! Our girls are returning for one last ride filled with seduction and a lot of sex! Try to uncover all mysteries surrounding the Fetish Locator App. Romance more than 20 girls and discover more secrets as you shape the conclusion of your story in Fetish Locator Week 3.

name: Feast of Fools
summary: You have been invited to a mysterious dinner party. But alas, it seems you are to be the dinner! Flee, and you may yet survive!!

name: F.E.A.R. 2: Reborn
summary: Experience four brand new single-player levels in this additional DLC campaign for F.E.A.R.2! Coinciding with the events seen in the full game, you will experience the chaos of Alma‚Äôs aftermath from an entirely new point of view: that of Replica Soldier 813.

name: Fell in love with the Nobility girl As a member of the rebel organization
summary: The Kingdom of Caeser is facing internal and external difficulties. As the captain of the rebel army, I met Cosgray, the daughter of the Duke who was loyal to the Kingdom of Caeser, at this time. In my interactions with her, she has become increasingly unforgettable to me.

name: Femdom Wife Game: Zoe
summary: "Femdom Wife Game - Zoe" is a relationship simulator. Zoe, your partner, has grown tired of your sex life and wants to try new things. Only she wants to be the one in charge. The game offers both authenticity and immersion. Start your new life with Zoe!

name: Ferdinand Fox tries Ecoterrorism
summary:
A minigame compilation about using any means necessary to save the planet!

Help Ferdinand fight climate change and the government while caring for his mental health in this minigame compilation! Choose actions to take based on your resource need and get ready to mash your keyboard or controller.

name: Feedback
summary:
In year 691 of the celestial calendar, the dimensional control computer "Laxis" ran amok under the influence of an unknown interdimensional energy, striking out against mankind. Using its dimensional powers, Laxis escaped to another era. Using your dimensional controller-equipped power suit, the Arouza, you must hunt down and destroy Laxis.

Starting out in space, you control Arouza, which bears an uncanny resemblance to the metal knights in Herzog, as it flies towards the enemy. In the Space Harrier vein, you see your character from behind while enemies appear from the horizon. On later stages, set above the planet surface, the resemblance is stronger, especially since you can run on the ground. You have two weapon systems, consisting of a gun and target-seeking missiles, which have a limited supply. Arouza can be upgraded using powerups released when killing certain enemies. Upgrading is a good precaution before you encounter the end-of-level bosses, since you only have one life (with a power bar, mind you) to waste.

name: Fear Effect
summary:
It can recognize fear‚Ä¶ can you?
Fear Effect, the pioneering cel-shaded cinematic action game, returns!

Immerse yourself in this intense thriller featuring revolutionary Motion FX technology where you direct your cast of 3D characters within dynamic, full-motion-video worlds. Who lives? Who dies? Only you decide if you can control your fear.

name: Feodika
summary: Live your own story in a world of the early Middle Ages! Lead a dynasty, expand your domain, help your subjects, and don‚Äôt forget to leave an heir! Thy Kingdom Come!

name: Fear for Sale: Mystery of McInroy Manor
Fear: Call of the village.
summary: FEAR: Call of the village is a first-person horror game made in realistic 3D graphics and fearsome. In it you have to get into a mysterious village and solve various riddles, the solution of which will be hindered by various inexplicable phenomena by science.

name: Fear Factor: Unleashed
summary: The game puts the player inside the action of the hit TV show, and features 12 spine-tingling stunts that will test gamers' steadiness, stomachs and nerve. Players can choose to play Fear Factor: Unleashed single player mode, where they will face five other competitors in an intense three-challenge contest to crown a winner. They can also play other custom single player modes or set up profiles for six friends and challenge each other in several party-style multiplayer modes.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Luxembourg
summary: This free DLC adds the entire country of Luxembourg to the game world of Fernbus Simulator.

name: Fetch Re;Quest
summary: After successfully leading her friends through a one-shot TTRPG campaign, part-time barista and full-time gamer Flora now faces a new challenge‚Ä¶ How can she possibly muster up the courage to tell her DM that she likes him?!

name: Fetch Quest Remastered
summary: Would-be adventurer Flora accepts a job to retrieve a stolen item for a shady bartender. To retrieve the item, she'll have to infiltrate a group of notorious bandits by posing as a new recruit. This expands the hit game Fetch Quest with more content, upgraded graphics and unlockable extras through different story routes.

name: Feed It Souls
summary: A metroidvania for the GBC

name: Fear of Hunger
summary: Healthy breakfast before school lunch

name: Fenrir's Prelude
summary: You play as Fenrir, living on a floating island named Midrealm. You have friends who you care about, including your best friends: Amaterasu and Aphrodite. But you get the idea that something is off with someone on the island, especially once Aphrodite goes missing. It is up to you to figure out what is happening on Midrealm.

name: Fear the Dark Unknown
summary: The clock is ticking and the survival game can no longer be stopped. James and Chloe have been chosen and nothing will ever be the same again after discovering the Dark Unknown.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Austria/Switzerland
summary: The first map expansion for Fernbus Simulator connects the Alpine countries, Switzerland and Austria, seamlessly and without any loading sequence to the existing Map of Germany.

name: Fer.al
summary: Fer.al is an online playground of fantastic species of myth and legend. Bring your creature to life as you design, create, and play in this strange and beautiful universe.

name: Felt That: Boxing
summary: Felt That: Boxing is a comedic boxing game set in a world where the charm of furry puppets collides with the fury of boxing. Step into the shoes of Ezra "Fuzz-E" Wright, an unlikely hero with a big heart. His quest? Battle his way through the Tournament of a Million Punches to save an orphanage!

name: Femdom Hero
summary: Experience a day of being dominated by Lyra, your super-strong, sensual, sexy, sadistic childhood friend.

name: Fear Me: The Silent
summary:
A small adventure of horror, mystery, hope and quirkiness.

Will you be able to save your family?

Will you be able to control your visions?

Who will you be at the end of it all?

name: Feitu Huiguniang
summary:
"Feitu Tonghua" Second Chapter.

Stories that take place in a wasteland world following a nuclear war.

name: Fear Night Tales: Brothers Kebab Saloon
summary: You are the person who looks after the kebab shop because your brother is sick. You learn how to make kebabs and get to know the customers. But there seems to be something strange here...

name: Feel the Snow
summary: Choose one of the characters and start your journey. The game has many interesting things in store: building, crafting, puzzles, bosses, mystery, laughs, quests etc.

name: Feed the Greed
summary: A short active incremental game. Send skeleton villagers with sacrificial offerings to a growing space rift. Feed the rift in exchange for essence, unlock different offerings and their upgrades - all for the sake of more essence.

name: Feline Sweet
summary: Feline Sweet is a family friendly 2d arcade puzzle platformer and level editor featuring pixel cats in hats and hidden objects. The game has 2 modes normal and Custom (for sharing levels between friends and for playing ones you design yourself).

name: Fera: The Sundered Tribes
summary: Fera: The Sundered Tribes is an enthralling mixture of monster hunting action RPG with village building and tribe management in a unique post-apocalyptic fantastical world of untamed magic and ancient secrets.

name: Fear 2: The Disappeared 207
summary: This is a puzzle-solving, survival, adventure, survival, and horror shooting game I made. The viewing angle of the game is from a bird's-eye view, and you will control Yang Tian (the protagonist) Continue to survive the monster's attacks and seek the truth.

name: Femboy Streamer
summary: A life sim where you play as a moderator in your son's stream and help protect him from bullies in chat.

name: Feichang Mowang Beelzebub
summary: This is an RPG strategy game that plays the role of a devil to find a way to conquer the world. Let evil descend on this beautiful and peaceful world!

name: Fenrir Banquet
summary: Welcome to Fenrir Banquet! Control the carrot to guide the rabbit to Fenrir and feed it! Can you satisfy Fenrir?

name: Feel the Magic: XY/XX
summary: Sega makes its debut on the Nintendo DS with Feel the Magic: XY/XX, a stylized adventure rife with wild events. The story follows a man who uses a suave gang of dramatic performers to gain the attention of a beautiful woman. To help him impress the girl, you must guide him through a series of madcap performances, such as defending against raging bulls and blowing out giant candles. The game supports the unique features of the DS, which let you control the main character with a stylus, your voice, and even your breath.

name: Ferra
summary: A boss rush bullet hell with bosses based on garden tools

name: Fear to Face
summary: It is a psychological horror game and walking simulator. Take care of a cat and a house. Monsters jumping towards at your screen.

name: Feda: The Emblem of Justice
summary:
In a fantasy world, a soldier from the imperial forces deserts after witnessing the massacre of innocent villagers by his unit. He is sent to jail to be executed, but manages to escape with the help of two former unit colleagues. The group flees through the country-side, while being pursued by imperial soldiers. On their way, they join forces with other rebels to fight against the enemy, while uncovering hidden secrets and evil plots by the Empire.

Feda: Emblem of Justice is a strategy RPG similar to Shining Force and other titles with preset characters and linear gameplay. The player commands a party of varying size and characters with diverse skills.

In the main battle sections, the player and the CPU-controlled enemy take turns moving the troops and giving orders. A menu at the bottom of the screen shows all the possible actions, where soldiers can defend, move, attack, or use an inventory item on each turn. The range of their movements and weapons vary according to their nature. A crossbow character can shoot from the back, while most sword and knife users have to be adjacent to their targets. Magic offensive powers have different ranges as well, reaching enemies that are far away from the attacking character. Health points can be recovered by eating rations or by magic, where a healer can restore points to several characters at once.

Each party member has separate health and magic points, as well as other statistics like defense and attack power. They receive experience points after slaying an enemy or casting a spell, and extra points at the end of the battle. Their skills increase after surpassing 100 points.

The map screen shows the party and groups of enemies traveling through the landscape in turns. The menu has options for moving the group or camping. In the encampment, one of the characters around the fire pit saves the game, while another inside the tent provides system options to change the interface color, adjust sound volume and rename the party members.

In some locations like temples, villages and towns, the party has to explore the place and talk to the citizens to move on to the next section. In later battles, the player has to make a moral choice about attacking mutated humans. At the end of each battle, the party is assigned a dark or light emblem, and certain party members choose to leave or stay in the group based on its alignment.

name: Feather
summary: Feather is a serene game about exploration and immersion in a beautiful landscape. Become a bird, fly around and lose yourself in zen-like flow whilst listening to the soothing ambient soundtrack.

name: Fear Underground
summary: Left alone with the horror of the dungeon, the main character must uncover its secret. It is he who will become not only a test of strength and endurance, but also a guiding thread leading to the unraveling of the unknown forces guarding this secret.

name: February of Cards
summary: This is a card game where you place 28 cards arranged like a calendar and compete with your opponent by taking the coins placed there and combining them with bonuses obtained by taking them continuously. Choose a player from among 26 alphabet characters and aim for the strongest.

name: Feet in the Snow
summary: You keep having this strange dream, why don't you talk about it? Maybe you can make sense of what it all means...

name: Feed The Flames
summary: A shadowed forest looms, its hostile residents bound to an ancient evil that is rising again. You bear the heavy burden of an age-old ritual‚Äîto keep the demon at bay. Keep the sacred flame burning until dawn, or risk the fate of both yourself and the world.

name: Fengse Huanxiang 3: Zui yu Fa de Zhenhunge
summary:
**This game is playable in Chinese only**

The 100-year battle between humans and ghosts ended when the hero Jiaseduo used the seven magical emblems to seal the leaders of the ghosts. But those ghosts were symbols of nature. Although the humans won the battle, their crime against the nature brought punishment. After the death of Jiaseduo, the seven emblems broke the curse and were released into the world. 92 years after the Ghost War, the humans were threatened once again. North Empire and South Republic united at the sight of a common enemy. The Holy Fire King called the best fighters in those two countries, and they formed an organization called "Duan Zui zhi Yi" - "Sin-Breaking Wings". Led by the young and beautiful girl Karin Seraphim, the fighters are now ready for their greatest battle ever...

name: Fear Effect 2: Retro Helix
summary: The fear is back.Return to 2048 Hong Kong in the groundbreaking survival-horror that defined style and mature storytelling for a generation.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Usedom
summary: The island of Usedom is the first free DLC for Fernbus Simulator and contains two completely new destinations: The seaside resort of Ahlbeck and the town of Usedom.

name: Feign
summary: Feign is a role-playing game with maximum 12 players that takes place in a small town where innocents, imposters and neutrals together. You use your role at night to win and send a person from the village in the morning.

name: Feral Flowers
summary: Feral Flowers is a quick-fire roguelite platformer for hay fever haters: dodge the pollen, beat the flowers! Rather than a traditional health meter, the game's timer needs to be topped up by killing enemies. The player can tank any number of hits - unless the timer reaches zero, in which case bullet hell ensues, and a single hit will send them all the way back to the first stage.

name: Feed The Reactor
summary: An incremental unfolding game about feeding fuel into a reactor. Combine elements to produce energy, unlock exotic technologies and explore a strange galaxy.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Denmark
summary: The danish are considered to be the happiest people in the world. They have their own word for cosiness and that is hyggelig. Perhaps it is the gentle and beautiful landscape that makes the danish people happy. Owners of the Fernbus coach simulator can now find out with the add-on Denmark.

name: FearFactor Institute
summary: FearFactor Institute is a chaotic VR multiplayer horror game set deep within a twisted underground research facility known as Morphix Industries. Navigate haunted labs, forests, reactors, and impossible architecture while uncovering a disturbing story‚Äîand avoid becoming prey to the entities lurking within.

name: Fever Meme
summary: Fever Meme is a comedy/parody game that pivots between multiple genres as it spits in the face of traditional game design. The game is self-aware of your actions as you play, your past mistakes, and so much more. And the further you make it into the game, the more the dynamic between player and creator is explored as the fourth wall is completely stripped away.

name: Fear of the Darkness
summary: Fear Of The Darkness is a narrative psychologic game that will push you to face the phobias of some patients. Through different game phases you will look for Brightness. Be careful not to get overwhelmed by their emotional burden, step out of the Darkness and explore the various corners of Truth.

name: FeedMe Puzzle
summary: Feed your pets in this puzzle-style game where you must match the tiles of different animals with their favorite food. Clear the screen to lighten the balance's weight and allow the counterweight to reach all the locks that will gradually reveal the background image.

name: Femboy Futa House: Dirty Election
summary: The academic year at the College of Magical Arts is in full swing, so the residents of 9 3/4 Dursley Way aren't just dealing with problems, they're dealing with HUGE PROBLEMS! Who could be a more terrifying enemy than the Principal at a place like this? The STUDENT COUNCIL, of course!

name: Featherweight
summary: In the fight against the machines, featherweights play a minor role - scouting, recon and spying. Considered as mere data collectors rather than true warriors, they're untrained in combat and ill equipped for any encounters with the enemy. However, when Thadd, a young featherweight, sees a fellow featherweight captured by the enemy and taken to their base, he decides that he will sneak into their compound and help her escape - even if he has to do it all by himself. Using your left mouse button (Walk, interact, select items) and your right mouse button (look, deselect items), guide Thadd in his daring attempt to break his fellow featherweight free!

name: Fearful Symmetry & The Cursed Prince
summary: Fearful Symmetry is a fun puzzle game with a unique brain-teasing twist. Control two characters at the same time; both in different dimensions. It‚Äôs up to you to move the characters simultaneously in opposite directions to guide them through treacherous puzzles filled with traps.

name: Fenix
summary:
The story is about Yaga's past, the past and story nobody tells about her and her desires.

Here you gonna help Yaga to get the magical artefact of Kuigorsj, leadead by the feather of a real Fenix.

name: Feed Me Oil 2
summary: Feed Me Oil is a physics-based puzzle game developed by HolyWaterGames for iOS, Android, and Windows Phone devices. The game was released on the iTunes App Store in June 2011 and Google Play in July 2012, by publisher Chillingo Ltd.

name: Feather Park
summary: Explore an autumn park and play minigames. Make friends and enter the barn.

name: Few Nights More
summary: Few Nights More is a roguelike turn-based RPG based in a world where Vampire Lords seek to conquer lost territories and their place in the world. Design and defend your stronghold, slay your enemies with traps, fulfill your Lord‚Äôs true potential, slowly conquering what is rightfully yours.

name: Fear the Unknown: Dave Story
summary:
In the first episode of Fear the unknown ,In the game, you will play as one of the lucky ones who met them and survived.

This game offers a first-person narrative experience, blending walking simulation with elements of exploration, driving, drinking, and interactive conversations.

name: Feeble Light
summary: Blast off as a little star trying to rid the cosmos of angry celestial beings in Feeble Light, a 3-tone pixel art shoot‚Äôem up where minimalistic presentation makes way for precision controls and fluid animation!

name: Fetus
summary: Fetus is an arcade hardcore platformer set in ancient Rome.

name: Fearless Pinocchio
summary: Fearless Pinocchio is a single-player ticket redemption arcade fighting game, released by International Games System in 2006. In order to save Geppeto from the clutches of Captain Hook, Pinocchio must defeat various minions and fantasy villains in six consecutive rounds.

name: Few Nights More: Genesis
summary: Few Nights More: Genesis is a roguelike turn-based RPG based in a world where Vampire Lords seek to conquer lost territories and their place in the world. Design and defend your stronghold, slay your enemies with traps, and fulfill your Lord‚Äôs true potential, slowly conquering what is rightfully yours.

name: Feast of the Beast: Unleashed
summary: "Top-down action and survival shooter, playable solo or cooperatively. Explore Valachia with your brother and face off against humans, lycanthropes, and rival vampire clans as you advance towards the origin of TOX-Z, the toxin that consumes the world."

name: Fengse Huanxiang
summary:
**This game is playable in Chinese only**

Once the Earth was inhabited by gods. But as the human race came into the world, the gods decided to leave the Earth, and only three goddesses were left in charge. Under their guidance, the humans developed their science and technology. But the greedy humans did not accept the superiority of the goddesses, and rebelled against them. Since then, the humans find themselves in a continuous war with gods, demons, dragons, and other races.

Over a thousand years later, a young girl named Lufia becomes a treasure hunter. She and her friend Anjieni accept missions all over the world, hoping to earn money and to find the ultimate magic spell. Once they received an assignment to fight against a group of pirates. This was just the beginning of a grand adventure during which Lufia will meet people who were directly involved in the great cosmic struggle many years ago...

name: Feeding Frenzy 2: Shipwreck Showdown
summary: Become the biggest fish at the top of the food chain with Feeding Frenzy 2 Shipwreck Showdown, now on the PlayStation Network! Start as the little fish in the ocean and get your ‚Äòeat‚Äô on! Feast upon fish smaller than you and you‚Äôll grow bigger and bigger. Avoid predators, or you‚Äôll become THEIR meal. Feeding Frenzy 2 features 60 levels of underwater fun and above water challenges and local multiplayer Party Games and Frenzyfest modes

name: Feline Forensics and the Meowseum Mystery
summary: There's only one detective to unravel this murder turned museum heist... and they're the cat's meow. Interrogate a "colorful" cast of suspects until they cough up hairballs... and the truth. Will you wrap up the case in time for an afternoon nap, and make injustice knead its last biscuit?

name: Feudums
summary: Feudums is a medieval strategy simulation with a detailed player-to-player vassalage system, full modding support and community-driven narrative. Balance diplomatic, economic, and military aspects while making your play for the throne. Is it your destiny to rule?

name: Fears to Fathom: Woodbury Getaway
summary: In the fifth episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Sydney Harper, a 23-year-old working at a consulting firm plans a weekend getaway to a rental in Woodbury with her college friends. Little did they know what was about to unfold during their stay. Sydney survived as she made the right choices.

name: Feel-A-Maze
summary: YOU WILL FEEL-A-MAZE!

name: Fernandez Big Mystery
summary: A fantasy game with touches of environmental humor. The story is about a wench who has to solve a great mystery, which greatly intrigues the town where she lives and for which she has to immerse herself in a great adventure.

name: Fears to Fathom: Ironbark Lookout
summary: Jack Nelson, a 24 year old fire lookout, transferred to a new outpost. As he settled into his new home, he couldn't shake the feeling that something was off, little did he know what was transpiring down in ironbark state park.

name: Fever Dream
summary: Fever Dream: Escape the nightmare 'Ignatius' has trapped your soul in. Survival is key. You aren't alone in the dream, but only you have the power to escape!

name: Feline
summary:
This is a platformer adventure with our beloved cute werecat, Feline. Run, jump, and use Feline's special skills to overcome every obstacles. 
 
What are you waiting for? Come join Feline in her fun adventure finding her lost memories! 
 
Features: 
‚òÖ Three different languages available: Indonesian, English, and Japanese. 
‚òÖ Full voiced (in Indonesian language). 
‚òÖ Get new adorable costumes for Feline. 
‚òÖ Twenty stages available for you to conquer. 
‚òÖ Interesting and heartwarming story of the heroine.

name: Ferulorum
summary: Strategy/simulation game/Auto-Battler - Higher mercenaries, equip them, organize them into a team and watch as they fight through the dungeon collecting loot and gold. Clear your way through 5 locations in the Kingdome so you can enter the deepest reaches of the castle and reclaim the lost relic.

name: Ferocious
summary: Immerse yourself in a survival FPS adventure. Stranded on a dangerous island, face mercenaries, dinosaurs, and a vibrant yet hostile ecosystem. Explore breathtaking environments and survive the onslaught of intense, fast-paced encounters.

name: Feast of the Beast
summary:
In a ravaged future, humanity has discovered an alien pathogen on Mars capable of generating TOX-Z‚Äîa toxin that, when combined with certain minerals, produces a source of energy more powerful than nuclear power. However, this discovery unleashes a catastrophe: the ambition to control this energy drives governments to allow the spread of the pathogen, turning people into destruction-thirsty zombies.

Now, the world has plunged into chaos. As a player, you must survive in a hostile environment, facing relentless hordes and uncovering the dark secrets behind the spread of TOX-Z. Your fight will not only be for survival, but for control of the most powerful and dangerous energy source ever known.

name: Fears of Glasses O-O
summary: In this game you have to overcome your fears. Monsters from under the bed, monsters who knock on doors, knock out windows, cemetery, bugs, spiders, aliens and much more. All that you are afraid of, you will find in this game.

name: Fear of Hot Water Ghost
summary: "Watch out! The terrifying sexy water ghost is here!" A survival horror action-adventure where you escape from a nightmarish city that has suddenly gone mad.

name: Fetish Locator: Week Two
summary: The second installment of the Fetish Locator Trilogy is here! Find out what's next for our protagonist as he's thrown into a lewd frenzy with over 20 girls! How will your prior choices ultimately affect things? Test your limits as you seduce and romance your way to the top in Fetish Locator!

name: Femdom University 0
summary: Femdom University 0 is an Open-World Survival-Dating-SimGame which is all about Femdom. You are a student in a university of dominant females where you have to take care of yourself and survive

name: Ferrum's Secrets: Where is grandpa? - Collector's edition
Fern Flower
summary:
In the ashes of a ruined world, hope for salvation exists only in old legends.

A religious cult in a distant village suffers from a devastating disease.

They believe their lives could be saved by the healing power of a mysterious flower that grows deep within a dark, terrifying forest.

Picked by fate ‚Äî or by cruel providence ‚Äî a desperate squad of chosen ones is forced to embark on a journey where every step may be their last. All for the sake of salvation... to find and reach the Fern Flower.

But they will suffer not only from the poisoned air and the cursed post-apocalyptic nature. Fear, doubt, and loss loom over them, threatening to darken their path and hide the right way.

Will these doomed souls have a chance to survive the journey through the forest? Or will the chase for the Fern only bring them into new danger?

name: Feed and Grow: Fish
summary:
Hunt and eat other fish - simply, grow into larger beasts! Play with friends too with new Multiplayer version! Early Access Game 
 
Animal survival game based in the fish world! You start as Bibos the fish and straight away you are ready to dive in to the waters of the mesmerizing world of Feed and Grow.

name: Fear & Hunger 2: Termina
summary: Fear & Hunger 2: Termina is oppressive, relentless and hopeless. A mix of jRPG and Survival Horror. Turn-based combat meets resource management. 3 days to explore the wicked town of Prehevil and find out about its dark secrets. 3 days until the pale and sickly green moon rises at its apex. Termina is upon us!

name: Fear the Timeloop
summary: Fear The Timeloop is a survival horror game where every fifteen minutes, the protagonist dies and resets to the starting point. Can you break the cycle and escape the loop?

name: Fear in the Facts Farms
summary: Fear in the Facts Farms is a multiplayer tossing game where you hurl pumpkins  at rivals and evade ghostly spirits . Explore colorful farm environments , learn fun trivia during the day , and survive the spooky night !

name: FEB: Brazilian Elite Force
summary: After an alien arrives in Brazil, the Brazilian army created the FEB - Brazilian Elite Force, a high tech agency with only the best of the bests. Choose one of three agents: Samanta, Zolrys and Silva, and save Brazil from an alien invasion in this 2D platform/shooter game.

name: Fear the Dark Unknown: James
summary: The clock is ticking and the survival game can no longer be stopped. James and Chloe have been chosen and nothing will ever be the same again after discovering the Dark Unknown.

name: Fengse Huanxiang 4: Shengzhan de Zhongyan
summary:
**This game is playable in Chinese only**

This installment of Fengse Huanxiang (Wind Fantasy) series is connected plot-wise to its predecessor, and is set in the same fantasy world and time line. The war between the countries of Ice and Fire devastated both those states, and Karin Seraphim, the white-haired leader of the special unit "Sin-Breaking Wings", found herself and her best friend in the opposite camps. Now, with the rulers of both countries dead, the war is finally over. However, there is a new disturbance in the Dragon Tomb. The Holy City of Nilu sends the priestess Niyi to investigate the matter. And when the young woman arrives at the tomb, she finds demons there... is this the beginning of a new war?

name: Feudal Friends
summary: Feudal Friends is a competitive tower defense game. Each player has different tasks within the tower and they work together to produce new soldiers and determine strategies to conquer the opposing tower. Plan your strategy well because this war does not wait for anyone!

name: Feng Shui: Meowjong
summary: Feng Shui: Meowjong is a roguelike Mahjong puzzle game with mystical treasures and strategic tile-building. Arrange 14 tiles, trigger powerful synergies, and master Feng Shui to beat target points!

name: F.E.A.R. 3
summary: F.E.A.R. 3 is a sequel to F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin and the third installment of the series. New to this game is the ability to play the campaign in either single-player mode or co-op mode. As well as being playable online, co-op is also available offline via split screen. In single-player mode, the player can initially only play as Point Man. However, upon the completion of each level, the player unlocks the ability to play through that level as Paxton Fettel. Level layout, cutscenes, and dialogue are identical irrespective of which character the player is using.

name: F.E.A.R.
summary: "F.E.A.R." (First Encounter Assault Recon) is a critically acclaimed first-person shooter game released in 2005, developed by Monolith Productions and published by Sierra Entertainment. Blending psychological horror with intense combat, "F.E.A.R." puts players in the role of a point man in a special forces team tasked with containing a mysterious and powerful paranormal threat. The game's advanced AI, atmospheric storytelling, and impressive graphics create a deeply immersive experience. Players must navigate through dark, foreboding environments, battling both human enemies and supernatural entities while uncovering the dark secrets behind the paranormal phenomena. Renowned for its tense atmosphere, dynamic firefights, and haunting narrative, "F.E.A.R." stands out as a landmark title in the horror shooter genre.

name: Feather Party
summary: Welcome to the fantastic party on the adorable planet of chicks! Feather Party is a multiplayer party game for up to 8 players. Engage in a diverse array of fun mini-games with friends or against rivals to be the winner of this party!

name: Ferret Frenzy
summary: Ferret Frenzy is a compilation of four minigames with variants made for Pirate Software's 2024 Game Jam. Starring Ferrets and made for fun by Team Suspiciously Inconspicuous. It's FREE, what are you waiting for?!

name: Fear the Moon
summary: A story driven cryptid horror game about a werewolf creature named "the Wolfman". Play as Jane along with her three friends who unknowingly camp the night in The Wolfman's territory deep inside an Ohio forest.

name: Feed the Cups
summary: Feed the Cups is a game made of drinks. It will make you experience every bit of a drink shop. You will work in various beverage stores: preparing materials, ordering for customers, making drinks, making cups, and so on. You can cooperate with up to 2 people on the screen!

name: F.E.A.R. Perseus Mandate
summary: F.E.A.R. Perseus Mandate is the second expansion pack to F.E.A.R. The game's action and horror elements are tied to a plot filled with backstabs and double-crosses as senator, his lackey and a group of shadowy mercenaries clash in their journey to unlock the mysteries revealed in the previous F.E.A.R games. In addition to the weapons from the first two F.E.A.R games, in Perseus Mandate the player has access to a grenade launcher, a lightning gun and an advanced rifle, all of which will be necessary to dispatch a tough new cast of bad guys. Unlike the previous expansion, this title can be played stand-alone and does not require the original game.

name: Fenimore Fillmore: 3 Skulls of the Toltecs
summary: 3 Skulls of the Toltecs was one of the last classic point & click adventure release in 1996, now you can play it again in this wonderful remastered version with enhanced graphics up to 4k.

name: Feed Me
summary: The toothy hole is hungry again ‚Äî Feed It! Where to get food? Catch fish, farm, set traps and hunt. The local villagers will help you, one way or another... Can you satisfy the monster's insatiable appetite?

name: Fetch
summary: Find the crown, world peace, yourself, and maybe a boyfriend in this turn-based RPG. Fight and explore your way across the Dog Kingdom while getting to know the off-beat inhabitants of this world steeped in conflict.

name: Feisty Fauna
summary: Feisty Fauna is a ridiculously cute survivors-like / bullet heaven where you're an animal trying to survive. Whether it's by laying traps, being a ninja, or charming minions, you will hunt other cute animals in this eat-or-be-eaten animal world.

name: F.E.A.R. Extraction Point
summary: F.E.A.R. Extraction Point is the first standalone expansion pack for the video game F.E.A.R. A prominent gameplay element new to this game is reflex time, an ability which slows down the game world while still allowing the player to aim and react at normal speeds. This effect is used to simulate the player character's superhuman reflexes, and is represented by stylized visual effects, such as bullets in flight that cause air distortion or interact with the game's particle system. Other new features include the ability to bash open doors by using the melee function, as well as blast them open with explosives, and the ability to smash crates, some of which contain supplies.

name: Feast Your Eyes
summary:
A 3D surreal horror game that combines fixed camera angles with 2.5D elements. The game is mostly focused on its dark world that is occasionally littered with a strange threat or puzzle. Things start off a bit slow but gradually escalate, all while being mindful to pace itself and balance a level of intrigue, involvement and introspection.

Travel between several strange locations, varying from a decrepit theater to a small forest village with no people in it, partake in strange events and overcome any challenges that may come your way. But be wary, things are often not what they seem.

name: Featherpunk Prime
summary:
Featherpunk Prime is a twin stick action-platformer mega mission with a mighty weapons arsenal, tricky procedural levels and colossal boss fights! It's one super-agile Robo-Flamingo and its armoured sidekick against a horde of avian warbots; relentless, powerful and berserk! You'll need skill, strategy and a slick trigger finger. Ascend the tower, execute the Guardians and take down the Cybirdroid Corporation...

Lock... Load... Flamingooooo!!!

name: Fever Cabin
summary: Survive five challenging and anxiety inducing nights by making sure zombies and other creatures stay out of the cabin.

name: Feed Him
summary: Welcome to Feed Him, a horror-themed adventure game set in a small, innocent-looking town. Uncover dark secrets, explore eerie places, defeat your evil roommate and escape before it's too late. Immerse yourself in a spine-chilling experience with stunning graphics.

name: Fear for Sale: Endless Voyage - Collector's Edition
summary: In this ghostly continuation of the Fear for Sale series, you've discovered a luxury ocean liner bears an eerie resemblance to a ship that vanished years ago.

name: Fear Effect
summary: Fear Effect is an action adventure waiting to unfold! Wee Ming Lam disappears a few days before her 18th birthday under mysterious circumstances. Three ruthless mercenaries conspire to track her down and ransom her off to her father, Mr. Lam, a powerful Triad leader in Hong Kong. An extortion mission to retrieve Wee Ming Lam becomes a lesson in survival against the most unimaginable of enemies.

name: Ferus: The Dark Abyss
summary: Pay attention to what is hidden in the darkness, if you want to get out alive you will have to sharpen your wits!

name: Fear Equation
summary:
Fear Equation is a turn-based horror strategy game where you play the engineer of a modified freight train, built to protect its occupants from a deadly fog that brings their nightmares to life. Survival depends on analysing passengers' dreams, crafting defenses, upgrading, scavenging and resource management.

As the Engineer, you'll need to rescue survivors, analyse their dreams and build defenses to protect them from their own imaginations. Complicating matters, passengers have their own theories as to how the fog was created and will form inter-carriage factions based on their beliefs.
