Every game is unique and you can customise your Engineer to dramatically change how the game is played.

name: Fez
summary: Gomez is a 2D creature living in a 2D world. Or is he? When the existence of a mysterious 3rd dimension is revealed to him, Gomez is sent out on a journey that will take him to the very end of time and space. Use your ability to navigate 3D structures from 4 distinct classic 2D perspectives. Explore a serene and beautiful open-ended world full of secrets, puzzles and hidden treasures. Unearth the mysteries of the past and discover the truth about reality and perception. Change your perspective and look at the world in a different way.

name: Fenimore Fillmore: The Westerner
summary: Take on the role of Fenimore Fillmore as you confront the evil John Starek, who has been threatening the local townspeople into selling him their land. In this wild adventure, you'll meet more than 30 different characters, collect useful inventory objects, and encounter an array of Wild West situations. Ride the rails, fight in barroom brawls, or choose to take it outside in a deadly gunfight. The choice is yours. If you help the townspeople fight to keep their land, you just might be able to ride off into the sunset with the girl of your dreams.

name: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin
summary: F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin is the sequel to F.E.A.R. and continues the series' trademark blend of supernatural horror and suspense. Many mechanics from the original first-person shooter have made their way into the game, like slow motion bullet time, and intelligent AI. New gameplay elements have also been introduced, like grab and drag movable cover, combat mechs, and iron sight aiming. The environments are now more open and less linear than those in the first game, and are also more diverse.

name: Ferral Quest
summary:
Open world. With different biomes: forest, jungle, desert, wasteland snowy, volcanic. In addition to dozens of dungeons to explore and hidden secrets.
Open world PVE missions, special dungeons.
Raid Bosses and Wanderers to hunt scattered around the world.
Progression from Tier 0 to Tier 10.
Develop your skill tree to make your character unique.
Different buffs and equipment so you can forge your strategy in battle.
Get the best equipment by destroying big bosses in their dungeons.

name: Feathered Escape
summary: Soar to freedom in Feathered Escape, a platformer where you, as a trapped bird, navigate challenging environments, overcoming obstacles and adversaries to reclaim the open skies.

name: Fetch
summary:
How far would you go to save your best friend?

Follow Milo on a sensational and fantastic journey as he attempts rescue his dog Bear.

name: Fear Therapy
summary: Fear Therapy, is a multiplayer(1-4) and single player psychological horror game.Try to complete the quests and leave the horror house before it is too late! Satan getting angrier every second and nothing holding it back.

name: Feed The Queen
summary:
FEED THE QUEEN is an active incremental game with a focus on strategic play and synergy-building.

Gather food to grow and evolve your colony. Hatch and upgrade different worker types. Discover new synergies. Optimize your production, customize your build, and feed the Queen ever-increasing amounts of food.

name: Fenix Rage
summary:
Fenix‚Äôs village was decimated by a huge explosion, leaving only our hero and the mysterious Oktarus. As Fenix, track down this shadowy villain through nine worlds, defeating brutal bosses and hundreds of minions bent on your destruction.

Fenix Rage mechanics are unique yet simple ‚Äì infinite jump and dash paired with instant restarts. Race through hundreds of increasingly difficult levels, with new mechanics like fire, ice and jump portals. Each level has a split-second of opportunity for passage through the hordes of unrelenting enemies; either approach the obstacles through trial and error or pause to mentally traverse the level and plan for an optimal route. Try to top the leaderboards while listening to slick retro-inspired music and dashing through fantastic environments.

name: Fernando Mart√≠n Executive
summary: Fernando Mart√≠n Executive is a basketball game for the MSX.

name: Feed Me Oil 2: Liquid Puzzle Adventure
Feed Me Billy
summary: Feed Me Billy Demake is a 2020 horror game developed by CrackedGhostGames. It is a 8-bit version of Puppet Combo's Feed Me Billy.

name: Fear for Sale: The Dusk Wanderer
Fear For Sale: Hidden in the Darkness
Fell
summary: Fell is a 2d Precision Platformer with a retro 1-bit aesthetic. Play through multiple unique areas, unlock new color palettes, and use fun movement abilities to conquer levels and make difficult jumps!

name: Fear & Hunger 3
summary: The third installment of the Fear and Hunger franchise, teased by its creator Miro Haverinen, is set to be released in the future.

name: Fetch - A Boy and his Dog
FeeSoeeD
summary: Welcome to FeeSoeeD. Open the front door to a beautiful underground world of future!

name: Female Warrior Mancas: Troll and The Princess Chained
summary: A beat-em up game from nekofuguri.

name: Ferrari Virtual Race
summary:
Among car companies, Ferrari stands alone as a symbol of luxury, power, and grace under pressure. Few auto fans would give up the chance for a virtual test-drive of these wonderful machines, and this is exactly the appeal of "Ferrari Virtual Race" to newer and older gamers alike.

If you've ever wanted to experience the feel of taking out a Ferrari on a track, this game might be for you. If you or someone you love is a car fanatic, few games offer quite the punch of the game, which allows players to get behind the wheel of several classic Ferrari sports cars and have fun on a compelling track and landscape.

The key-word here is fun: For many, this game will be a sort of dream come true. Featuring the chance to "test drive" the 430 Scuderia, 599 Fiorano and 612 Scaglietti models of Ferrari, the game is a great introduction to what makes the company such a powerhouse in the auto and racing industries.

name: Federation Quest 1: BSS Jane Seymour
summary: A sci-fi action game with a first-person perspective. The player must fix a series of starships with failing systems before they explode, contending with runaway alien lifeforms throughout.

name: Fear For Freedom
summary:
"Two days ago a monster appeared in the hallway outside the office. 
 
Maybe if I just wait it will leave eventually." 
 
A very short psychological game dealing with isolation, entrapment and the nature of fear.

name: Feeling Arrow
summary: Experience hilarious scenarios with a unique twist in Feeling Arrow! Take on the role of an archer armed with feeling imbued arrows, using them to solve various scenarios in a funny and unconventional way.

name: Felampire
summary: Felampire is a 2D Metroidvania where you play a vampire cat. Navigate a dark world, absorb powers, solve puzzles, make moral choices, escape the crypt and uncover your past to shape your destiny.

name: Fear For Sale: Phantom Tide - Collector‚Äôs Edition
FeedVid Live
summary: FeedVid Live is a short puzzle game taking place in an unusual livestreaming app. It's a standalone sequel to FeedVid - the games can be played in any order as the stories are not directly related.

name: Feeble
summary: FEEBLE is an interactive simulation game. Meet FEEBLE, the only surviving character in the village devastated by the epidemic, and save FEEBLE from the Grim Reaper. Look around the village, use various puzzles to protect from the Grim Reaper and save the FEEBLE.

name: Fear of Nightmares: Madness Descent
summary: After having witnessed his own hanging, the character finds himself in a forest where strange events begin to happen. While traveling through dark enviroments in order to restore your his sanity he will encounter various obstacles aswell as malformed horrors lurking in the dark.

name: Februus Depth
summary: Large underground catacomb level.

name: Feed of Comfort
summary: Short interactive story on indifference, inertia and hopelessness #ResistJam

name: Fear of the dark
summary: Keep the fire burning, stay away from the darkness

name: Fear of Bugs: The Fear Experience
Felix VR
summary: "Felix VR" is a VR story based on the series "F√©lix" by Movistar +. It is a nightmare of our protagonist where, while she is kidnapedd, regrets every lie she told F√©lix. Those lies haunt her, remaining etched to her skin, like tattos...

name: Ferrari Challenge: Trofeo Pirelli
summary:
Ferrari Challenge Trofeo Pirelli is a racing game developed by Eutechnyx and published by System 3, based on the Ferrari Challenge, a single-marque motorsport championship. The Nintendo DS version features wireless multiplayer and the Wii version uses the motion sensing functionality for steering. The Nintendo DS, Wii, PS2 and PS3 (only in Europe and the United States) versions are available. The game includes 14 race-able tracks and Ferraris' own Fiorano test track (for training using a solitary F430 Challenge), a vinyl editor and online play.

The game primarily features the driving and racing of the Ferrari F430 Challenge, along with a series of Ferrari road and racing cars that can be unlocked.[1]

name: Fertilizer
summary: Alaska, a girl who loves to take care of plants, draw and hang out with her best friend. This time she will need your help to fertilize the new plants which she bought, and I'm sure you will work well together. I think you'll even learn a few new and effective gardening tips!

name: Ferrari Challenge: Trofeo Pirelli + Supercar Challenge
Feed
summary: A top-down survival horror, where you must fight your way through a mysterious mansion, surviving it's crazed inhabitants.

name: Felix the Cat
summary: A Game Boy port of Felix the Cat.

name: Fearless Night
summary: Fearless Night is a 2D fighting game in the same vein as Guilty Gear.

name: Feelin
summary: Feelin is a creative world-building sandbox game. Build your imagination world with simple wood resources, for example, wood house, tower, sea port base, famous architectures. Also enjoy sharing your lovely scenes and artistic architectures on SNS.

name: Feminist Confessional
summary: Confess Your Feminist Sins

name: Febilis
summary:
This game is a prototype version.
It has been designed for Xbox controllers but can still be played with mouse and keyboard. It features a save system you can use to save your progress and keep playing later on.

name: Fear Them
summary: Immersive psycho-horror online multiplayer - explore abandoned places and investigate paranormal entities that watch you from the darkness and seek your life. Sprawling maps, advanced XP and andvancement system, incredible AI.

name: Feed Pete
summary: The villages junk food eating plant is sick and needs feeding. Feed it with Junk food and popcorn. before poor Pete crosses the rainbow bridge. But beware. Not everyone wants to see Pete grow!

name: Fever
summary:
Max is a teenager, who got sick of fever.
He's having weird dreams because of that.
Find the 11 effects and leave your room.

A Yume Nikki fangame developed for Dream Diary Jam 7.

name: Fernageddon
summary: A combat based RPG / strategy game.

name: Felix the Toy
summary: Inspired by classics from long ago, help a toy named Felix find his owner when a mysterious event takes over the planet

name: Fear Mythos: The RPG
summary: Based on the Slender Man spin-off mythos, notably made by one of the original authors of the stories.

name: Fear Assessment+
summary:
‚ÄúFear Assessment+‚Äù is here to give you the fear of you watching ‚ÄúLost Episode Creepypastas‚Äù again, or the feeling of going through cardiac arrest.

I officially announce ‚ÄúFear Assessment+‚Äù an alternate version of the fear assessment, with extended content, including: 3+ levels, an narrator, settings, longer levels, better and unique experience, and the scare-factor goes from 5 all the way to 10.

name: Fearlyss
summary: Fearlyss is an online FPS shooter with lots of development and game modes to come.

name: Felix in the Factory
summary: Felix has to find enough oil in every level so the factory's generator will not run out of it.

name: Feathered Run
summary: Feathered Run is a 4-button precision platformer-runner with 2D graphics. Embark on an exciting escape through Antarctica. Playing as one of the seemingly helpless penguins.

name: Ferd
summary: As a Viking warrior, you embark on a journey of vengeance through the magnificent Nordic landscapes of the Viking Age. With bow and arrow you defend yourself and your Viking comrades from hordes of attacking enemies.

name: Felis
summary: Felis is a platformer game with a realistic art style where players attempt to save trapped cats.

name: Feudal Lords
summary: This is a turn-based strategy in which the kingdoms are fighting for territory.

name: Fernocity
summary: You're in Fernocity, the most corrupt city in the world. A level with loads of action, and lots of places to explore: A pier, a strip club, an abandoned power plant, an arcade store, a bank, and even a haunted apartment building! And much, much more!

name: Femboy Bangers 2
summary: A late night drive around town in search of pizza has you stumbling upon a new establishment.

name: Fenakkumura Monogatari
summary: Fenakkumura Monogatari is a "Legend of Zelda" style short game.

name: Featherfall
summary: soulslike action rpg

name: Fernbus Simulator: VDL Futura FHD2
summary: This DLC brings the whole range of the VDL Futura FHD2 - in all six variations - to your fleet.

name: Fegefeuer Soul Tower
summary: Fegefeuer Soul Tower is a Cozy Adventure (Up to 4 Player). Manage a Shop, Farm and City while fighting through a Tower to escape the Fegefeuer.

name: Feed The Gods
summary: Feed The Gods is a fun card battler for 3-6 players. Enter a chaotic party roguelike where you and your friends forge your way using powerful cards. Escape the pit of doom and leave rival cultists to be devoured by the ravenous Hungry Ancient Deity.

name: Fency Krabby
summary: Gentlekrabs, ready to battle! Don't let anyone take you the title of Crab King!

name: Fear of Clowns
summary: You woke up in the middle of the night from the doorbell's sound. Someone wants to play with you...

name: Feed Some Ducks
summary: A serene lake. Magenta above. Ducks abound. Bread?

name: Federation
summary: Explore & build your way home in this 3D time-manipulation production puzzler.

name: Felix the Cat's Giant Electronic Comic Book
summary: A cancelled CD-i port of Felix the Cat's Giant Electronic Comic Book.

name: Feline Fortress
summary: In 'Feline Fortress', an action tower defense, you're Mousse, The Clever Cat. Defend your home against invading mice with cat-a-pults and laser-pointers to outwit your crafty foes. Strategy and agility are crucial in this dynamic cat-and-mouse showdown. Paws at the ready!

name: Ferrule Instincts
summary: You‚Äôre Kayla Ferrule - And your birthday is in a week. However, your friend Miles Hector got in with some bad apples. Can you outsmart everyone and make it to your 20th in one piece? Test your instincts in this brief interactive adventure based on Yellow Optic‚Äôs Fool Me Twice.

name: Fern Light
summary: Play as Wanda, a 17-year-old on a quest to uncover a Polish legend's secrets. Solve puzzles, explore captivating landscapes, and dive into a richly hand-drawn world of mystery and magic. Ready for an unforgettable adventure?

name: Feed the Head
summary: Poke the Head. Prod the Head. Tug the Head... but most importantly, Feed the Head. Like a living cartoon, the Head will unfold and transform in surprising, startling, and hilarious ways.

name: Feudal Kingdoms
summary: Feudal Kingdoms is a medieval Grand Strategy strategy game, which sets new limits to the genre with challenging features. The realistic population structure is only one of the few features you shouldn't miss.

name: Feed Da King
summary: An idle clicker game that features moments of active and passive play, with a dynamic window system that allows you to toggle the game on top of other applications and adjust it to your preference.

name: Fear in the Modern House: Ch.2
summary: A psychological horror game, based on horror movie stories, in which you live Josh's life, dubbed and subtitled.

name: Fertiliel: Cupid Simulator
summary: As a cupid in this visual novel, help couples have great conversations and get together on dates! These couples you create will have many kids and help repopulate Earth.

name: Fetch Quests Anonymous
summary: Procgen Quests In A Procgen World

name: Feed Eggs
summary: Put as many eggs as you can in its mouth

name: Fear & Respect
summary: An open-world crime game, developed by Edge of Reality, that would have starred Snoop Dogg as a thug living in South Central L.A. The game was cancelled on March 1, 2006.

name: Feudalism II
summary:
The age of Feudalism continues! Once again you start a long journey as a weak chieftain with the goal of becoming the most powerful warrior and ruler of the whole world.
The world is bigger now, there're 6 different nations,12 heroes, lots of weapons, armor and much more ways to vanquish enemies. Recruit soldiers, buy and upgrade equipment, conquer cities and challendge great heroes to make yourself the king of kings!

name: Feed Us
summary: In Feed Us you are a killer piranha ready to devour everyone that crosses your path. The more you eat and accumulate blood the more you can upgrade your piranha and your piranha army! Get sharper teeth, bigger fins and stronger scales to create even more havoc.

name: Festival of the Spirit
summary: a tenderfoot prologue

name: Fellow Moon
summary: In Fellow Moon, players play a former special operations leader who wakes up in a phone room with no memory and no identity. As the plot progresses, a superhuman threat emerges in the city of Nanting.

name: Ferris Mueller's Day Off
summary: Ferris Mueller‚Äôs Day Off is all about searching for a mule that is off sick. It‚Äôs full to the brim with clever puzzles, interesting characters, colourful locations and puns.

name: Fear Unlimited
summary: A side-scrolling beat-'em-up heavily inspired by the Devil May Cry franchise.

name: Fear Station Bravo
summary: Tech-base themed map with non-linear design and alternative paths.

name: Fear for Sale: The House on Black River
Fengdu: Chronicles of Battle
summary: "Fengdu Chronicles of battle" is a roguelike game that combines auto chess and card building. The use of cards will directly affect the battle situation. Collect different cards, elixirs and magic tools in battles, combine your own strategy and complete this journey to become an immortal.

name: Fenix Box
summary: This is a hardcore minimalist 2D platformer that tests how much of a hardcore gamer you are.

name: Feywing
summary: Feywing is a short game loosely inspired by classic internet ritual stories. You must memorize and navigate the strange environment of the Crossroads to collect materials for the ritual, and escape the Crossroads. During all of this, the whimsical Feywing will be there to guide you along.

name: Fear of Fear

name: F.E.A.R.
summary:
The Xbox 360 port of F.E.A.R. contains an Instant Action mode for single-player. In this mode, players are dropped into a modified level and must get to a designated point as quickly as possible whilst simultaneously killing as many enemies as possible and being as accurate as possible. Graphically, this versions is equivalent to the PC version on maximum settings with an high dynamic range lighting, an advanced particle system and HD textures. It also features an exclusive bonus level not found in the PC original, which depicts Holiday's attempt to extract Bishop from ATC headquarters. These versions also features a new weapon, dual wielded automatic handguns.

The PlayStation 3 port of F.E.A.R. features the same Instant Action mode from the Xbox 360 version. It also has its own exclusive additional weapon (a street sweeper shotgun) and bonus mission, which depicts the Delta Force recon team's journey through ATC headquarters prior to encountering Alma. Like the Xbox version, the game's native resolution was 720p, but the other enhancements were removed for this version.

name: Fever Golf
summary: This is a game about early 2000s bargain bin CD culture, that is, games that few people played & fewer remember. They were the last few digital artifacts that were allowed to fall into the quiet oblivion of history‚Äîthe rear guard of an older era that pre-existed our current climate of perpetual distribution. This is a game for the MySimAquariam and MoonTycoons of the world; bottom-shelf junk-ware with a soul.

name: Fear Effect 2: Retro Helix
summary: Set in a crazed, alternate future of Hong Kong, Fear Effect 2: Retro Helix is the prequel to the survival-horror hit Fear Effect. You play as one of four deadly mercenaries on a team that's been commissioned to bring back the kidnapped daughter of a powerful Chinese executive. The action begins with Hana, Glas, and Deke the three main characters from the original game meeting each other for the first time. Soon afterward they meet Rain, a close friend of Hana's. Hana, Glas, and Deke are on separate missions to retrieve three objects, but before long they realize that they're involved in the same deadly plot. The action takes the foursome through Hong Kong, Hell's Kitchen in New York City, the walled city of Xi'an, the lost tomb of the first emperor of China, and in the end, to the mountain island of the immortals, Penglai Shan. Then, after lunch, things really get crazy!

Erra Quann, the treacherous alien scientist who designed Flagship Quann Tulla, the pride of the Federation, has hijacked the ship and piloted it to an outpost of the evil Empire where he plans to sell the secret of its engines. As a member of the elite Federation secret service, your mission is to stop him! The battle will take place in the energy-shattered hull of the Quann Tulla, through deep space and on to the final desperate conclusion on a distant alien world. The fate of the universe is once more (gulp!) in your hands!

Federation is a graphic text adventure and is an enhanced version of the 1985 text adventure Quann Tulla by 8th Day software. This version included graphics for each location as well as some minor location differences and some different directions.

name: F.E.A.R.: Ultimate Shooter Edition
summary:
Experience the original F.E.A.R. along with F.E.A.R. Extraction Point and F.E.A.R. Perseus Mandate.

Be the hero in your own cinematic epic of action, tension and terror. A mysterious paramilitary force infiltrates a multi-billion dollar aerospace compound, taking hostages but issuing no demands. The government responds by sending in a Special Forces team only to have them obliterated. Live footage of the massacre shows an inexplicable wave of destruction tearing the soldiers apart. With no other recourse, the elite F.E.A.R. (First Encounter Assault Recon) team is assembled to deal with the extraordinary circumstances. They are given one simple mission: Evaluate the threat and eliminate the intruders at any cost.

F.E.A.R. Extraction Point Extraction: Point kicks off where the original game ended ‚Äì with a bang. As the helicopter which the F.E.A.R. team is on attempts to leave the vicinity, it instead winds up crashing. The F.E.A.R. team is thus forced to seek out an alternate extraction point, all the way battling the now free Alma and her paranormal minions across a destroyed city.

F.E.A.R. Perseus Mandate: As the first F.E.A.R. team and Delta Force fight for control of the situation, a second F.E.A.R. team is sent in to shed some light on Armacham Technology Corporation's (ATC) dark past. As a member of a secondary F.E.A.R. team, you are brought in to discover more information regarding the secret project at the ATC facilities. The multiplayer component for this expansion is no longer available.

The mechanics in the game are quite different from the previous games. The player is thrown into a series of "levels" where he (taking part as Fenimore or Rhiannon) will have to solve a few puzzles in order to get to the next level. Also a few action scenes are present in the form of small shooting sequences.

In this episode, Fenimore and Rhiannon find a dying man in the middle of the desert, who tells them of the whereabouts of a treasure from a recent theft hidden inside a tomb, just before passing out.

Just after that a gang of outlaws lay an ambush on them, kidnapping Rhiannon. Our objective will be not only to rescue the poor girl and getting hold of the treasure, but also to pay vengeance on the villains.

When the existence of a mysterious 3rd dimension is revealed to him, Gomez is sent out on a journey that will take him to the very end of time and space. Use your ability to navigate 3D structures from 4 distinct classic 2D perspectives. Explore a serene and beautiful open-ended world full of secrets, puzzles and hidden treasures. Unearth the mysteries of the past and discover the truth about reality and perception. Change your perspective and look at the world in a different way.

name: Fetch Quest
summary: Some dorks play a tabletop game.

name: Feline Shenanigans
summary: Mathias Schultz is a dude looking to make some extra dough to afford a vacation to Thailand. He accepts a job offer to babysit a family of cats while the owners are on vacation. But to Mathias's surprise, The cat's stir up quite the ruckus and it's up to Mathias to survive the frightening ordeal.

name: Feralbound Online
summary: Feralbound Online encourages you to survive, roleplay, and fight to your hearts content. Featuring endless possibilities for customization; journey throughout different lands as you uncover secrets and meet new friends!

name: Fengse Huanxiang 2
summary:
**This game is playable in Chinese only**

Shuilan is a land that hovers above the ocean. Recently, a demon lord appeared nearby. The people of Shuilan know that the demon lord's plan is to invade and to conquer their country. The wise teacher Wentini builds a special unit of fighters, called the Fate Travel Group. She knows that the only one who can help the people of Shuilan is a girl with special powers, named Li Fu. She sends a young fighter named Ares to find Li Fu, but meanwhile Shuilan is invaded by a hostile army. The battles for survival begins...

name: Featherbound
summary: A flightless bird named Pip wants to prove the world wrong and summit the top of the tree he calls home. Help Pip solve physics-based puzzles and navigate the tree's seemingly endless branches all the way up. Can you make it to the top of the tree?

name: Fear Virtual
summary: The game features an SMG starting weapon, Three Release Maps : Rikers-Inn, Desert-Town and Storage-Facility. On each map are AK-47 weapon and M-4 Carbine pickup weapons to eliminate your opponent with. It will replace your SMG as your only and primary weapon, Capture the briefcase.

name: Fear of Mine
summary: Fear of Mine - a visual novel in the genre of adventure and horror. This game will tell a linear but incredibly deep story in which the main characters fell under the influence of an alien mushroom creature. It seems to take over the whole world

name: Female Nation Takeover: josei Kokka Nottori Keikaku - Touzoku no Ore ga Ou ni naru
summary: In a country where women hold all the power, a bandit aspires to take the crown.

name: Feet Paradise
summary: What is a paradise for the feet? It's when your feet are tender and gentle, when your feet are kissed and just admired. This is exactly Feet Paradise!

name: Feminazi: 3000
summary: Race your oppression away! Kill all men in the race of your life - the race for tolerance and equality.

name: Fear Effect: Reinvented
summary: Fear Effect Reinvented is a cancelled remake of Fear Effect. Announced in 2017, it was to be developed by French studio Sushee, who were later replaced by MegaPixel Studio, and published by Forever Entertainment. The remake was planned to release for the PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PlayStation 4.

name: Femdom Game World: Stacy
summary: Femdom Game World: Stacy is a visual novel with a deep plot, designed for an adult audience. Finding yourself in the role of a student, you will have to win a bet: to seduce your pretty teacher. But who would have thought that the young teacher will turn out to be a strict and ruthless Mistress?

name: Feisty Feet
summary:
Feisty Feet, is more of a traditional game with a slight twist. It‚Äôs a take on the side-scrolling running game popularized by Canabalt. You control a little guy who runs toward the right side of the screen, leaping over obstacles and from platform to platform, most of which are at different heights. 
Instead of it being an infinite runner, they‚Äôve changed the gameplay so it‚Äôs a race with other runners. It‚Äôs not just a simple race, though; it reminds me more of a kart racer. You have special power-ups that give you a speed boost and make you jump. You can also pick up weapons, ranging from a simple snowball to a rocket launcher and some sort of tangle grenade that you drop behind you to stop an opposing runner briefly.

name: Ferrari Challenge: Trofeo Pirelli
summary: The racing game genre has always been one of the most successful genres in video gaming accounting for 12% of all games sold. Ferrari is a top brand in the world making the combination a perfect match. The first preview of the Ferrari Challenge game by the international press will be held on June 23rd at the home of Ferrari, Maranello, Italy and will coincide with the finale of Ferrari's 60-year celebrations throughout which System 3 has been a major sponsor. The celebration tour started in Abu Dhabi in January and is set to traverse fifty countries before concluding at the Ferrari factory and the Ferrari home test circuit, Fiorano. Details of further titles from System 3 including "Ferrari Street Racer", featuring the whole range of Ferrari' cars will also be announced at the event.

name: Feverfew
summary: Two bastards beat the shit out of each other and kiss kiss fall in love. Or maybe not.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Interlink HD
summary: Welcome to the era of the Interlink HD, a masterpiece for passenger transportation! Expand your fleet with 2 new variants of the Interlink HD and experience the future of travel.

name: Felt Tip Circus
summary: Welcome to the smallest show on Earth! The lights are bright. The tension, real. The audience, demanding, even if they are made of wood. Now it‚Äôs your turn to compete in the greatest contest of skill ever to grace the miniature world of toys, trinkets and plain old junk! Throw knives; launch acrobats; walk tight-ropes; tame lions; hone your skills solo or compete with up to four friends in a race to win the crowd.

name: Fear for Sale: Nightmare Cinema
summary: A hidden object game for PC and Mac.

name: FellaTrain
summary: Simulation for adults practicing mature activitie. J-Eroge that's simple to play and easy to enjoy.

name: Fetish Room 18+
summary: Fetish Room 18+ is an exciting adult visual novel that will captivate your fantasies. You'll enter a world of erotic adventures, where you can indulge in a compelling storyline and a plethora of adult content.

name: Feztal
summary: FEZTAL is a very short game, which can be described as a fusion of FEZ and Portal. Use a combination of Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device and Gomez's unique abilities to navigate through test chambers.

name: Fears to Fathom: Carson House
summary: In the third episode of Fears to Fathom you play as Noah Baker, an 18 year old who got a small job offer to house-sit for the COO of a local media company for the weekend, he takes the offer as he had nothing interesting going on for that weekend. It wasn't long before he began experiencing something very unsettling about the place. Little did he know what was about to come.

name: Fear The Void
summary: Something goes wrong during your subway journey home, leaving you in quiet darkness. Can you find your way back to reality? And are you sure you're alone? An atmospheric horror game, that will get you consumed‚Ä¶

name: Fear in Hospital: Escape Horror Story
summary: Spine-chilling horror in an abandoned mental hospital - collect notes and keys, solve puzzles and find your way to the exit!

name: Feed Usagi For Sailor Moon
summary:
Unofficial catching game for Sailor Moon.

Everyone knows the girl named Bunny who every day protects the Earth and the moon from invaders from other planets and after a battle loves a hearty meal to restore her strength.

Help the "Usagi" to eat, collecting edible items! And always be alert, evil forces will try in every way to prevent you feed the sweet warrior, unpleasant surprises.

name: Felix the Cat
summary: Felix the Cat is an unlicensed platform game developed and published by Dragon Co. in 1998. It is unrelated to Hudson Soft's official Felix the Cat title, released in 1992, but the gameplay of the two games is very similar.
